tika-s0303t9:1_1: Mūlagandhādibhedaṁ gandhaṁ avanti apayuñjantīti gandhabbā, tesaṁ kāyo samūho gandhabbakāyo, gandhabbadevanikāyo.
tika-s0303t9:1_2: Cātumahārājikesu ekiyāva te daṭṭhabbā, tappariyāpannatāya tattha vā niyuttāti gandhabbakāyikā.
tika-s0303t9:1_3: Tesaṁ tesaṁ rukkhagacchalatānaṁ mūlaṁ paṭicca pavatto gandho mūlagandho, tasmiṁ mūlagandhe.
tika-s0303t9:1_4: Adhivatthāti mūlagandhaṁ adhiṭṭhāya, abhibhuyya vā vasantā.
tika-s0303t9:1_6: Taṁ nissāyāti taṁ mūlagandhaṁ rukkhaṁ paccayaṁ katvā nibbattā.
tika-s0303t9:1_7: Na kevalaṁ tattha gandho eva, mūlameva vā tesaṁ paccayoti dassento “so hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0303t9:1_10: Mūlādigandhānaṁ gandheti mūlādigataavayavagandhānaṁ gandhe, timūlādigatasamudāyabhūteti attho.
tika-s0303t9:1_11: Pubbe hi “mūlagandhe”tiādinā rukkhānaṁ avayavagandho gahito, idha pana sabbaso gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo.
tika-s0303t9:1_13: Soti so sabbo mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma.
tika-s0303t9:1_14: Tassa gandhassa gandheti tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe.
tika-s0303t9:1_15: Sarikkhaṁ sadisaṁ paṭidānaṁ etissāti sarikkhadānaṁ, patthanā.
tika-s0303t9:1_16: Yathādhippetaphalāni sarikkhadānattāva adhippetaphalaṁ dentu, asarikkhadānaṁ kathanti?
